sig_info: Murdock Boy - Exiting this mode has a 100% chance to grant a stacking 5 to 15 second Rage Debuff with no effect.
Stick’s Apprentice - While in this mode, attacks reduce the damage of the Opponent's Passive Degeneration and Direct Damage effects by 40 to 100.01% for 0.20 second(s).

ALWAYS ACTIVE: An enhanced sensory system allows Daredevil to bypass Miss.
ENTERING THE FIGHT: The Devil of Hell’s Kitchen gains an indefinite Passive Combo Shield, preventing his Combo Meter from resetting when struck.
FIGHT START: Base Regeneration Rate is set at 40% instead of the normal 100%.
Immune to all effects that modify Regeneration Rate, except Poison.
MURDOCK BOY - COMBO METER 15 OR LOWER: The unbreakable spirit of Battlin’ Jack Murdock grants the following:

When inflicted with a non-damaging Debuff, one of each non-damaging Debuff is Purified after 0.50 seconds. Each time this ability triggers, Devil of H.K. gains +5 Combo Meter. This ability goes on Cooldown for 2 seconds once activated.
Passive +2400 Physical Resistance against Basic Attacks.
STICK'S APPRENTICE - COMBO METER 16 OR M: The assassin training of Stick grants the following:
+685.71 Critical Rating.
Attacks reduce the opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 65%.
+21.75 Attack Rating for each Non-Damaging Debuff on the Devil of H.K. This bonus decreases by 5% for each additional Debuff.
When struck, 1 Combo Meter is lost.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit spends 10 Combo Meter to grant a 100% chance to gain a stacking Cruelty Buff, increasing Critical Damage Rating by +327.71 for 14 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to boost Critical Rating by 533.33 for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit immediately loses any Combo Meter gained.
Each hit spends 5 Combo Meter to grant a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed Debuff, causing 108.75 direct damage over 5 seconds.
At the end of the attack, gain a Rage Debuff with no effect, lasting 12 seconds. When this Debuff ends, it is replaced with a Fury Buff, granting +69.6 Attack rating for 25 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to gain a Righteous Wrath Passive for 70 seconds. While active, The Devil of H.K.’s basic attacks have a 35% chance to inflict an instant Bleed, causing 120% of the damage dealt by the attack as direct damage.

Stick’s Apprentice - While in this mode, attacks reduce the damage of the Opponent's Passive Degeneration and Direct Damage effects by 50 to 100% for 0.20 second(s).

ALWAYS ACTIVE: An enhanced sensory system allows Daredevil to bypass Miss.
ENTERING THE FIGHT: The Devil of Hell’s Kitchen gains an indefinite Passive Combo Shield, preventing his Combo Meter from resetting when struck.
FIGHT START: Base Regeneration Rate is set at 40% instead of the normal 100%.
Immune to all effects that modify Regeneration Rate, except Poison.
MURDOCK BOY - COMBO METER 15 OR LOWER: The unbreakable spirit of Battlin’ Jack Murdock grants the following:

When inflicted with a non-damaging Debuff, one of each non-damaging Debuff is Purified after 0.50 seconds. Each time this ability triggers, Devil of H.K. gains +5 Combo Meter. This ability goes on Cooldown for 2 seconds once activated.
Passive +2925 Physical Resistance against Basic Attacks.
STICK'S APPRENTICE - COMBO METER 16 OR M: The assassin training of Stick grants the following:
+835.71 Critical Rating.
Attacks reduce the opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 65%.
+237.25 Attack Rating for each Non-Damaging Debuff on the Devil of H.K. This bonus decreases by 5% for each additional Debuff.
When struck, 1 Combo Meter is lost.
HEAVY ATTACKS: The first hit spends 10 Combo Meter to grant a 100% chance to gain a stacking Cruelty Buff, increasing Critical Damage Rating by +399.4 for 14 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to boost Critical Rating by 650 for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Each hit immediately loses any Combo Meter gained.
Each hit spends 5 Combo Meter to grant a 100% chance to inflict a Bleed Debuff, causing 1186.25 direct damage over 5 seconds.
At the end of the attack, gain a Rage Debuff with no effect, lasting 12 seconds. When this Debuff ends, it is replaced with a Fury Buff, granting +759.2 Attack rating for 25 seconds.
